remarks: Formula-building inference rule for class substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.)  Obsolete as of 17-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbcbii instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
sbcbii.1 $e |- ( ph <-> ps ) $.
sbcbiiOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> [. A / x ]. ps ) ) $.
